titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on benzoxazol.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12846)

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/23/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on benzoxazol.
